skills.title: Full-Stack Web Development
skills.description: Designing, developing, and deploying modern web applications. Proficient in front-end frameworks like **React** and **Vue.js**, with a strong command of back-end technologies using **Node.js**.

skills.title: Data Science & AI
skills.description: Transforming complex datasets into actionable insights using **Python** and its ecosystem of libraries. Experienced in **data engineering** pipelines, machine learning, and creating interactive **data visualizations**.

skills.title: Telecommunications & Electronics Engineering
skills.description: Applying a foundational understanding of telecommunications and electronics principles to real-world problems. Skilled in signal processing, network analysis, and system design.

skills.title: 3D Modeling & Simulation
skills.description: Creating and simulating 3D models of antennas and electromagnetic components for engineering analysis using **CST Studio Suite**.

skills.title: Technical Communication
skills.description: Effectively communicating complex technical concepts and project outcomes through professional-grade reports and presentations. Experienced with tools like **Overleaf (LaTeX)** for academic writing and **PowerPoint** for visual presentations.
